statements: SELECT * FROM lead_information;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM lead_information WHERE lead_status = 'Interested';
SELECT lead_id, lead_phone, lead_source FROM lead_information WHERE lead_status = 'New' ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM lead_information WHERE lead_status = 'Follow-up' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_email, lead_status, lead_source FROM lead_information WHERE lead_name LIKE 'J%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM lead_information WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM lead_information WHERE lead_phone LIKE '%555%' AND lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM lead_information WHERE lead_status = 'New' ORDER BY lead_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT lead_source FROM lead_information ORDER BY lead_source;
SELECT * FROM lead_information WHERE lead_status = 'Contacted' AND lead_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY lead_email;
SELECT * FROM leads
SELECT lead_name, email FROM leads
SELECT lead_name, phone_number FROM leads WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc'
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT lead_name, email, phone_number FROM leads WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT lead_name, company_name FROM leads ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, email, campaign_name FROM leads JOIN email_campaigns ON leads.lead_id = email_campaigns.lead_id WHERE email_campaigns.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(lead_id) AS avg_lead_id FROM leads;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE status='Active';
SELECT customer_id, source, lead_score FROM lead_information ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, lead_score FROM lead_information WHERE source = 'Website' AND status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT lead_id, lead_status FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Google';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE lead_id = 5 AND campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 AND email LIKE '%gmail%';
SELECT DISTINCT lead_status FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website';

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, leads.lead_status, campaigns.campaign_name FROM interactions JOIN leads ON interactions.lead_id = leads.lead_id JOIN campaigns ON interactions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;

SELECT customer_id, name, email, lead_status, campaign_name FROM customers JOIN leads ON customers.customer_id = leads.customer_id JOIN interactions ON leads.lead_id = interactions.lead_id JOIN campaigns ON interactions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'active';
SELECT lead_name FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, campaign_name FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id JOIN campaigns ON subscriptions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT c.customer_name, l.lead_name, s.start_date FROM customers c JOIN leads l ON c.customer_id = l.lead_id JOIN subscriptions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, l.lead_name, i.interaction_time FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN leads l ON i.lead_id = l.lead_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'click';
